attributes.action: Make all British passport holders eligible for university home fee status
attributes.additional_details: British passport holders in British curriculum schools abroad already align with UK education. Treating them as home students is fair and removes an arbitrary financial barrier. It strengthens domestic recruitment, builds a reliable global pipeline and deepens the UK’s soft power by supporting families and teachers who already champion British education worldwide.
attributes.background: British passport holders in British curriculum schools abroad already align with UK education. Treating them as home students is fair. It boosts domestic recruitment, strengthens global influence and gives UK universities a powerful, values based pipeline they can control and grow.

rejection.details:
Give all British Citizens Overseas Access to Home Fees at English Universities
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732511
